title: # 404 - Cody Heller  & ME
description:
Today I sit down with writer/producer Cody Heller. We talk about writing on Wilfred, going to a brothel with her Dad, sloppy biscuits, kinks, the female orgasm, and much more! 

Cody’s Show “Dummy” is streaming right now on Quibi. 

My Brand new stand up special "Hey Big Boy" is streaming right now on Netflix! 

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: www.bertbertbert.com
